review.description: The iced coffee here is outrageously expensive and mediocre. I paid $3.50 for a large cup mostly filled with ice, and had to wait a good several minutes for it. I also asked for one sugar and the coffee was so sweet it was barely drinkable. Pastries are lame -- I think the croissants are from Sysco. Too bad for a neighborhood place with very pleasant owners.
review.author: Jen B.

review.description: The scones are awesome, the carrott muffin is delicious, the coffee is ok, and the cashier always has a smile on her face. It gets busy in the mornings so if you don't want to feel like you're back on the subway it may not be a good fit.
review.author: Flemming S.
